detail_desc: Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and string back.

Wide, knee-length dress in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and decorative gathers in the shoulder seams and at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with pleats for added width and wide, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Tailored trousers in woven fabric made from a wool blend with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Tailored trousers in woven fabric made from a wool blend with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Lined bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Set of three different shades of peel-off nail polish. 3x5 ml. Easy to remove – no nail polish remover required.
Coat in soft wool containing some cashmere with notch lapels, buttons down the front, jetted side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Coat in soft wool containing some cashmere with notch lapels, buttons down the front, jetted side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Calf-length skirt in lightweight, softly draping twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend that changes colour depending on how the light catches it. Wide, concealed elastication at the waist, smocking at the top and a flare from the knees down. Unlined.

Calf-length skirt in lightweight, softly draping twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend that changes colour depending on how the light catches it. Wide, concealed elastication at the waist, smocking at the top and a flare from the knees down. Unlined.

Calf-length shirt dress in silk with a soft crêpe finish. Collar, buttons at the front to the waist and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a narrow, detachable tie belt, and a gathered seam below the hips. Underdress in viscose crêpe with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Wide, straight-cut leather tunic with an opening at the top, dropped shoulders and balloon sleeves with cuffs. High slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Wide, straight-cut leather tunic with an opening at the top, dropped shoulders and balloon sleeves with cuffs. High slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.

Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases down the front.

Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases down the front.

Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases down the front.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in leather with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and extra-long, straight legs. Satin lining.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in leather with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and extra-long, straight legs. Satin lining.

Boxy, oversized jacket in a soft wool blend with a brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Concealed chest pockets with a flap and open patch pockets with a decorative flap at the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved, pleated top in jersey with a slight sheen. Round neck and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Flared blouse in soft, double-weave organic cotton with embroidery at the top. Gathered yoke, long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and buttons down the back.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and buttons on one shoulder. Patch front pockets, and a gently rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in a crinkled organic cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Hat knitted in a soft wool, alpaca and nylon blend with a wide, ribbed hem.
Hat knitted in a soft wool, alpaca and nylon blend with a wide, ribbed hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a linen and cotton weave with ties at the back. Lined. The cotton content of the sun hat is organic.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a metal button. Unlined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front and a narrow rib trim around the neckline.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a shirt and pair of shorts in airy linen. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, and calf-length legs.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Round neckline, opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a draped skirt. Satin lining.
Soft, non-wired nursing bra in lace and cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined, opening cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a braided cotton weave with covered elastication at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sequined mesh with a deep V-neck front and back. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with long puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a sweetheart neckline. Long puff sleeves with gathers and elastication at the shoulders for added volume, and a seam at the waist.
Short, glittery dress in jersey with gathers at the shoulders, a wrapover top, long puff sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton with a round neckline and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. One top is ribbed.
Shorter-style top in an airy rib knit. Deep wide neckline with an opening and ties at the front, long raglan sleeves and frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Shorter-style top in an airy rib knit. Deep wide neckline with an opening and ties at the front, long raglan sleeves and frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit that is open at the front with ties.
Fitted, long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit that is open at the front with ties.
A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and wrapover front with wide ties at one side. Concealed zip and concealed button at the back. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Calf-length skirt in satin. High waist with pleats and decorative metal buttons with sparkly stones at the top. Wrapover front and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Patterned swim top with a small stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and elasticated hem.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and patterned soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and patterned soles.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of puff shorts in a crinkled, organic cotton weave. Shirt with a rounded collar and button placket. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side. One patterned top and one in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side. One patterned top and one in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side. One patterned top and one in a solid colour.

Four-piece set with a patterned top and shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric, and a T-shirt and trousers in cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned jersey with a round neck and short butterfly sleeves.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.

Suit in a patterned weave. Single-breasted jacket with notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets, an inner pocket and slit at the cuffs. Suit trousers with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit in a patterned weave. Single-breasted jacket with notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets, an inner pocket and slit at the cuffs. Suit trousers with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

One-shoulder body in soft velour with a sheen. One long sleeve that is puffed at the shoulder, a detachable sparkly stone appliqué, gathers in one side for a gentle draping effect, and press-studs at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in a crinkled, organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and short legs with covered elastication at the hems. Lined at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Vest top in a crinkled, organic cotton weave with a button placket and short slits in the sides.
Short V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with double-layered flutter sleeves that fall in soft pleats over the shoulders. Elasticated seam at the waist with narrow ties at the sides. Lined.
Short V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with double-layered flutter sleeves that fall in soft pleats over the shoulders. Elasticated seam at the waist with narrow ties at the sides. Lined.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the front. Seam with covered elastication at the waist and decorative ties at the sides.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the front. Seam with covered elastication at the waist and decorative ties at the sides.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and gathered elastication at the top to create a draped effect. Concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and gathered elastication at the top to create a draped effect. Concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Deep V-neck, ties at the neckline, long wide raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
